Event.name: Product_development
Event.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Developer</fen> develops a <fen>Product</fen>, in some cases for a <fen>Company</fen>. <ex></ex> <ex>The <t>development</t> <fex name="Product">of a profitable product</fex> will be necessary for the company to stay afloat. <fex name="Dev">INI</fex></ex> <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Dev">Heinrich</fex> will <t>develop</t> <fex name="Product">a great new product</fex> <fex name="Company">for Apple</fex> <fex name="Time">someday</fex>. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Developer
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who develops the <fen>Product</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Dev">Elsa</fex> <t>developed</t> a new line of facial products.</ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Product
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity which is developed by the <fen>Developer</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Product">Dr. Pepper</fex> was <t>developed</t> in Texas.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Company
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The organization for which the <fen>Developer</fen> develops the <fen>Product</fen>.
<ex>Wilhelm <t>developed</t> the software <fex name="Company">for Microsoft</fex>, but they rejected it.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location where the <fen>Product</fen> is developed by the <fen>Developer</fen>.
<ex>Gabriela <t>developed</t> her new line of fashion <fex name="Place">in Milan</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Product</fen> is developed by the <fen>Developer</fen>.
<ex>The <t>development</t> of unique, high-quality writing instruments <fex name="Time">in the late 1990s</fex> saved the company from going bankrupt. </ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The manner in which the Product is developed.
<ex>High-quality products must be <t>developed</t> <fex name="M">quickly</fex> by employees.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Use
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The use for which the <fen>Product</fen> is intended.
<ex>This product was <t>developed</t> <fex name="Use">for underwater photography</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: develop.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to advance a product from one stage to the next

lexUnit.name: development.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the advancement of a product from one stage to another
